channel.title: Castillo on Simba Tango
channel.description: Recent content in Castillo on Simba Tango

item.title: Old tango hero
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: On our first visit to Buenos Aires, we rented a room in San Telmo. Right in the neighborhood is the Centro Cultural Torquato Tasso. For some reason we never came around to go there, even if it was by far the closest milonga. Until one evening, we finally found space in our schedule to visit El Tasso. There was to be live music, and we were quite excited. The place was packed with people, and all of a sudden an old man was announced, and with support from a couple of guys he entered the stage.
